author: craigmcc
msg: Add ".cvsignore" file so that CVS will now whine about "build" and "dist"

author: craigmcc
msg: Change the Struts build process to place the "build" and "dist"
directories *inside* the source directory, rather than up and over
("../build/struts" and "../dist/struts") as they are now.  Tweak the

author: craigmcc
msg: Make MessageResourcesFactory (and therefore subclasses of it)

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the Struts Example Application so that it no longer uses the
deprecated <struts:error/> tag (or any other deprecated tag).

author: craigmcc
msg: Add James W.'s suggestion of supporting configurable restrictions that a user
be in a particular security role before they can execute a particular action.
